name: Mission Graduates
description: Mission Graduates (MG) increases the number of K-12 students in San Francisco's Mission District who are prepared for and complete a college education. Fulfilling our mission for 45 years through a continuous pipeline of K-12 after-school, in-school, and summer programs, we will provide services to over 3,100 low-income children, youth, and families this year. College education as an expectation and goal for every child is a theme woven throughout all of Mission Graduates' programs. All our prog
